name: Lost Earth
description:
This is the tale of how the journey of finding your wife became a horrifying nightmare!
Julia works in a research center at a classified government Hospital while you have a normal job in the town.
It's been a month now that she hasn't responded to any calls, which is pretty normal on busy days, but this time something felt unusual :
You've set out on a journey to find her at the Hospital and make sure everything is okay.

What Happens Next, is what the Game is All about!

Explore the horror in First Person

Explore the forest, the hospital and the sewer from the first row.
Feel the character in every scene as you progress your journey into the unknown.
Experience the tense atmosphere where everything that moves and every sound you hear can be the thing that gets you killed !

Manage your Inventory

You'll need a lot of help to survive the apocalypse.
Explore every drawer, every cabinet and every room in the hope to find something that can help you take few more breathes.
Solve environmental puzzles to get deeper into the facility.
Find the notes, PDAs and collect data to unveil what exactly happened here.

And ofcourse, there are these undeads

Will you try and kill them, paralyze them to save ammo or just run for your life until you find the next cartridge.
Deal with the force greater than you, as you make your way out of this place.
Remember, some things, just can't be killed !

Key Features

  • A chilling survival horror
  • Be the character with First Person perspecive
  • Solve puzzles to advance the story
  • Explore a Forest,a Hospital and a Sewer as you try to find a way and items to survive
  • Defeat a monster that cannot be killed
  • A short play you can complete in hour and a half to two hours
Background Score
  • Samantha van der Sluis
  • Intro Cinematic - Original music by Savfk
